title: Call of Duty 4 Infinity Hook Private
description:
This hack was undetected by PunkBuster on 18 of March 2008, it will remain undetected untill at least the 28th of March 2008. Works for all versions.

CoD4 InFiNitY-Hook[Private]
//-Infinity Hooks-//-//-Infinity Hooks-//-//-Infinity Hooks-//-//-Infinity Hooks-//

All credits to Infinity Hooks

Injection Process:

1: Open CoD4 Infinity Hack.exe
2: Select options (Self explanatory)
3: Open Call of Duty 4
4: Alt+TAB out, and make sure it&#039;s injected
5: Enjoy!

WARNING : Do NOT change options while in a server,this will cause Call of Duty 4 to
crash. If you wish to change options exit out to the main menu then Alt+TAB, reselect
your options and rejoin a server.
